info.description: Backend API for LexFlow - Legal Practice Management System
info.title: LexFlow API

get.description: Get detailed analytics for cases
Get detailed analytics for clients
Get overview statistics for the dashboard
Get detailed analytics for documents
Get detailed financial analytics including revenue
Get detailed analytics for meetings
Get detailed analytics for team members (lawyers)
Returns paginated payment history for workspace
Returns list of payment methods for workspace

post.description: Adds a new payment method for the workspace
Creates Stripe Setup Intent for securely collecting payment method

delete.description: Deletes a payment method from the workspace

get.description: Returns receipt URL for a specific payment
Returns list of all available subscription plans
Returns the current subscription plan for the user's workspace

post.description: Cancels the workspace's subscription
Changes workspace subscription plan to a different one

409.description: Conflict - downgrade with too many users

post.description: Reactivates a previously cancelled subscription

404.description: Subscription not found or already active

post.description: Authenticate user and return JWT token
Logout current user (client-side token invalidation)
Register a new user account

get.description: Get all meetings for a specific date
Get paginated list of meetings with filters

post.description: Create a new meeting/calendar event

get.description: Get meeting details by ID
Get meetings for a specific month
Get overall meeting statistics
Get all meetings scheduled for today
Get upcoming scheduled meetings
Get meetings for a week starting from the specified date
Get paginated list of cases with filters

post.description: Create a new legal case

get.description: Get case details by ID
Get all comments for a case

post.description: Add a new comment to a case

put.description: Update an existing comment by ID

get.description: Get all tasks for a case

post.description: Add a new task to a case

put.description: Update a task for a case

get.description: Get timeline events for a case

post.description: Add a new timeline event to a case

get.description: Get paginated list of clients with filters

post.description: Create a new client

get.description: Get client details by ID
Get paginated list of documents with filters

post.description: Create a new document
Upload a document file with multipart form

get.description: Get document details by ID
Download document file
Get all file versions of a document

post.description: Upload a new file version of an existing document

get.description: Get details of a specific file version
Download file of a specific version
Get all notifications for the authenticated user with pagination

post.description: Create a new notification for a user

delete.description: Delete all notifications for the authenticated user

put.description: Mark all notifications as read for the authenticated user

get.description: Get the notification settings for the currently authenticated user

put.description: Update the notification settings for the currently authenticated user

get.description: Get notification statistics for the authenticated user
Get unread notifications for the authenticated user
Establishes WebSocket connection for receiving real-time notifications

put.description: Mark a specific notification as read

get.description: Displays API documentation using ReDoc interface
Get all pending invitations for the workspace (Pro Max Plan only)

post.description: Invite a new member to the team (Pro Max Plan only, admin/owner)

403.description: Subscription required, max team size, or insufficient permission

409.description: Already in team or invite exists

delete.description: Cancel a pending invitation (Pro Max Plan only, admin/owner)

get.description: Get all team members for the workspace (Pro Max Plan only)

delete.description: Remove a member from the team (Pro Max Plan only, admin/owner)

put.description: Update a team member's role (Pro Max Plan only, admin/owner)

400.description: Validation error or cannot modify self

get.description: Get profile information of the authenticated user

patch.description: Partially update profile information of the authenticated user. Only provided fields will be updated.

post.description: Generates new backup codes after verifying password
Disables 2FA after verifying password and TOTP/backup code
Initiates 2FA setup by generating a TOTP secret and QR code

get.description: Returns the current status of two-factor authentication

post.description: Verifies the TOTP code and enables 2FA, returns backup codes
Upload avatar image for the authenticated user

parameters.description: Avatar image file (JPEG, PNG, WebP, max 5MB)
parameters.name: avatar

delete.description: Delete avatar image of the authenticated user

put.description: Update language preference of the authenticated user
Change password of the authenticated user

get.description: Get all active sessions of the authenticated user

delete.description: Terminate all sessions except the current one
Terminate a specific session (logout from another device)

get.description: Get statistics of the authenticated user (active cases, clients, completed cases, days in system)

put.description: Update timezone preference of the authenticated user

post.description: Processes Stripe webhook events for payment and subscription updates

paymentMethodId.description: Stripe Payment Method ID from frontend

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
